heisigStory: The primitives here are top hat and animal legs. Once again, we glide over them until later.
koohiiStory1: Indicating 6 parts of the human body: head, body, 2 arms, 2 legs.
koohiiStory2: Six-Six-SIX ((666)) Mark of the Beast!! Imagine that dapper old beastly fellow summoning his top hat to himself. See it scamper over to him on a little pair of beastly legs.
readingExamples: 六 (む), 六つ (む.つ), 六つ (むっ.つ)
words:
六(む): (num) six
六日(むいか): six days, sixth (day of month)
六つ(むっつ): six
六(ろく): six
